about_the_game:
Get the Wanderer Set DLC and obtain uniquely powerful gear for Red. Defend yourself from supernatural forces with the Wanderer gear set; slashing back the darkness with a silver sword and firebane.

The Wanderer Set DLC contains the following items, unlockable after the crafting tutorial at the beginning of the game:

• Wanderer Outfit, sturdy and warm banisher outfit for Red, increasing melee damage by 5%
• Cortador and Ascua, silver sword and firebane inherited from a long lost illustrious Banisher, increasing Red’s last combo damage by 50%
detailed_description:
Get the Wanderer Set DLC and obtain uniquely powerful gear for Red. Defend yourself from supernatural forces with the Wanderer gear set; slashing back the darkness with a silver sword and firebane.

The Wanderer Set DLC contains the following items, unlockable after the crafting tutorial at the beginning of the game:

• Cortador and Ascua, silver sword and firebane inherited from a long lost illustrious Banisher, increasing Red’s last combo damage by 50%

short_description: Defend yourself from the supernatural and slash back against darkness with the Wanderer Set DLC. This gear set includes the Wanderer outfit and Cortador and Ascua, fabled weapons from a long lost, noted banisher.
